transforma.qb2_user_app

类 Util

  • java.lang.Object
    • transforma.qb2_user_app.Util

  • public class Util
extends java.lang.Object
    This is a util class for storing common methods

    • 方法详细资料

      • deviceVibrate

        public static void deviceVibrate(android.content.Context context)
        Call this method to virbrate the device
        参数:
        context - the activity context need for vibration

      • readFile

        public static java.lang.String readFile(android.content.Context context,
                                        java.lang.String fileName)
        Read a file from t device internal storage
        参数:
        context - activity context
        fileName - the name of the file (eg /doc/info.txt)
        返回:

      • writeFIle

        public static void writeFIle(android.content.Context context,
                             java.lang.String data,
                             java.lang.String fileName)
        Write a file to device internal storage, will be erased when app uninstall
        参数:
        context - activity context
        data - The data string to be written
        fileName - The path to the file (eg. "/doc/info.txt")

      • phoneCall

        public static void phoneCall(android.content.Context context,
                             java.lang.String phoneNumber)
        Generate a dialer dialing attempt
        参数:
        context - activity context
        phoneNumber - phone number in string

      • sendEmail

        public static void sendEmail(android.content.Context context,
                             java.lang.String emailAddress)
        Generate a sending email attempt to our company email
        参数:
        context - activity context
        emailAddress - email string
